name: BasilDash
description: A dashbaord that displays sensor data from an indoor leafy green growing operation. This was the capstone project for the BCA bootcamp, completed with 3 other developers and presented to about 50-80 people.

name: GeoVermonter
description: A geographic guessing game made in React

name: Yelpington
description: A Yelp-like application for restaurants located in Burlignton, VT

name: Remock
description: A website built from a mockup

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A classic Tic Tac Toe game

name: Zorkington
description: An implementation of a Zork-like game

name: Guess The Number
description: A command line guessing game played with the computer. This is the first project completed during the first week of the BCA development bootcamp.
